item.title: GitHub Copilot CLI: Why the Pricing Model Matters
item.description: An examination of GitHub Copilot CLI's premium-only model approach compared to Claude Code and OpenAI Codex CLI, and why free tier support would make it more practical for everyday use.
item.itunes:author: Min Wen
item.itunes:summary: An examination of GitHub Copilot CLI's premium-only model approach compared to Claude Code and OpenAI Codex CLI, and why free tier support would make it more practical for everyday use.
